name: Heal (itch) (awaveringspeck)
description:
*This project in development*

This is a quick build for MyFirstGameJam 2022, Theme: Healing, so not everything is perfect. Keep an eye on this page to see a finished build in the coming months!

This is a very basic game about a healer and his party as they attempt to escape a dungeon. The healer, who can do no damage and only heal, became overwhelmed in the tides of battle and ran, abandoning his party. He must now earn their forgiveness as they, together, attempt to make their way home.

As the titular healer, you only have healing abilities, and must use these abilities in unexpected ways to move through the dungeon.

The first of several - a serialized story told in installments, as our healer learns to come to grips with his fear.

*Not all features implemented*
